00051     HT_ASSERT(properties);

00117   // init helpers - don't call directly unless...

00120 
00124   struct Policy {
00125     static void init_options() { }
00126     static void init() { }
00127     static void on_init_error(Exception &e) {
00128       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00129       std::exit(1);
00130     }
00131     static void cleanup() { }
00132   };
00133 
00137   struct DefaultPolicy : Policy {
00138     static void init_options() { init_default_options(); }
00139     static void init() { init_default_actions(); }
00140   };
00141 
00145   template <class CarT, class CdrT>
00146   struct Cons {
00147     static void init_options() {
00148       CarT::init_options();
00149       CdrT::init_options();
00150     }
00151     static void init() {
00152       CarT::init();
00153       CdrT::init();
00154     }
00155     static void on_init_error(Exception &e) {
00156       CarT::on_init_error(e);
00157       CdrT::on_init_error(e);
00158     }
00159     static void cleanup() {
00160       CdrT::cleanup();  // in reverse order
00161       CarT::cleanup();
00162     }
00163   };
00164 
00165   struct NullPolicy { };
00166 
00167   // specialization for type list algorithms
00168   template <class PolicyT>
00169   struct Cons<NullPolicy, PolicyT> {
00170     static void init_options() { PolicyT::init_options(); }
00171     static void init() { PolicyT::init(); }
00172     static void on_init_error(Exception &e) { PolicyT::on_init_error(e); }
00173     static void cleanup() { PolicyT::cleanup(); }
00174   };
00175 
00176   // conversion from policy list to combined policy
00177   template <class PolicyListT>
00178   struct Join {
00179     typedef typename Meta::fold<PolicyListT, NullPolicy,
00180             Cons<Meta::_1, Meta::_2> >::type type;
00181   };

00197                   bool allow_unregistered = false);

00209              bool overwrite = false);

00215   void sync_aliases();

00223   template <class PolicyT>
00224   inline void init_with_policy(int argc, char *argv[], const Desc *desc = 0) {
00225     try {
00226       System::initialize();
00227 
00228       ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00229       properties = new Properties();
00230 
00231       if (desc)
00232         cmdline_desc(*desc);
00233 
00234       file_loaded = false;
00235       PolicyT::init_options();
00236       parse_args(argc, argv);
00237       PolicyT::init();
00238       sync_aliases(); // init can generate more aliases
00239 
00240       if (get_bool("verbose"))
00241         properties->print(std::cout);
00242     }
00243     catch (Exception &e) {
00244       PolicyT::on_init_error(e);
00245     }
00246   }
00247 
00252   template <class PolicyListT>
00253   inline void init_with_policies(int argc, char *argv[], const Desc *desc = 0) {
00254     typedef typename Join<PolicyListT>::type Combined;
00255     init_with_policy<Combined>(argc, argv, desc);
00256   }
00257 
00261   inline void init(int argc, char *argv[], const Desc *desc = NULL) {
00262     init_with_policy<DefaultPolicy>(argc, argv, desc);
00263   }
